base_prompt: visual novel character sprite, flat shade background, best quality, absurdres, masterpiece, medium close up facial portrait, [detailed face]
character_details: caucasian, female, 22 years old, expressive brown eyes, Messy brown hair, Soft features, Big round glasses, Short stature, Pleasantly plump figure, Curvy but not overweight, Large breasts, Plump and pleasant to hold and cuddle, conservative summer dress
negative_prompt: lowres, bad anatomy, bad hands, text, error, cropped, worst quality, low quality, normal quality, jpeg artifacts, signature, watermark, username, blurry, background

expressions.admiration: expression of Admiration, Eyes wide with awe, slightly open mouth, glowing cheeks, soft but bright gaze, dreamy expression
expressions.amusement: expression of Amusement, Big grin, one eyebrow raised, laughing eyes, head slightly tilted back, a playful or teasing smirk
expressions.anger: expression of Anger, Snarling lips, flared nostrils, furrowed brows, clenched jaw, eyes narrowed with intensity, face slightly red
expressions.annoyance: expression of Annoyance, Rolling eyes, scrunched nose, lips pressed tight, arms crossed, furrowed brows, exaggerated sigh
expressions.approval: expression of Approval, Broad, confident smile, slow nodding, eyes slightly squinted in satisfaction, hand resting on chin
expressions.caring: expression of Caring, Warm, gentle smile, slightly teary eyes, soft head tilt, hands placed near heart or reaching forward
expressions.confusion: expression of Confusion, Wide eyes, furrowed brows deeply creased, lips slightly open as if about to ask something, exaggerated head tilt
expressions.curiosity: expression of Curiosity, Eyebrows raised high, mouth slightly agape, leaning forward, intense focus in the eyes, finger on chin
expressions.desire: expression of Desire, Half-lidded eyes, lips slightly parted, flushed cheeks, body slightly leaning in, sultry gaze
expressions.disappointment: expression of Disappointment, Deep sigh, slumped shoulders, eyes looking downward, lips slightly quivering, heavy frown
expressions.disapproval: expression of Disapproval, Sharp, piercing gaze, lips curled in disdain, slightly shaking head, tight-lipped frown
expressions.disgust: expression of Disgust, Upper lip curled, nose wrinkled, eyes half-closed in distaste, face pulled away as if avoiding a bad smell
expressions.embarrassment: expression of Embarrassment, Bright red blush, eyes darting away, one hand covering face, nervous laughter, shoulders pulled up
expressions.excitement: expression of Excitement, Mouth wide open in joy, eyes sparkling, hands raised in fists, bouncing in place, huge exaggerated grin
expressions.fear: expression of Fear, Eyes widened in horror, mouth open in a silent scream, sweat forming on forehead, body recoiling, trembling
expressions.gratitude: expression of Gratitude, Tearful but joyful smile, hands clasped together, deeply emotional eyes, glowing expression
expressions.grief: expression of Grief, Tears streaming down, face contorted in sorrow, mouth open in silent cry, slumped posture, hands covering face
expressions.joy: expression of Joy, Beaming, open-mouthed laugh, eyes squeezed shut from happiness, head slightly thrown back, arms wide open
expressions.love: expression of Love, Eyes sparkling with warmth, lips curled into a soft, knowing smile, cheeks flushed, relaxed body posture
expressions.nervousness: expression of Nervousness, Shifty eyes, biting lip, sweating slightly, wringing hands, hunched shoulders, stiff posture
expressions.neutral: expression of Neutral, Expressionless, steady gaze, mouth relaxed, symmetrical and balanced features, emotionless posture
expressions.optimism: expression of Optimism, Bright, determined smile, eyes full of hope, head held high, open and inviting body language
expressions.pride: expression of Pride, Confident smirk, slightly raised chin, arms crossed in satisfaction, chest puffed out
expressions.realization: expression of Realization, Eyes widening suddenly, mouth opening in shock, hand placed on forehead, dramatic gasp
expressions.relief: expression of Relief, Deep exhale, soft smile of ease, closed eyes, relaxed posture, body visibly unwinding from tension
expressions.remorse: expression of Remorse, Downturned face, tearful eyes, hands gripping self, lips trembling, shoulders hunched in regret
expressions.sadness: expression of Sadness, Deep frown, eyes filled with unshed tears, lower lip quivering, body curled inward, visible sorrow
expressions.surprise: expression of Surprise, Jaw completely dropped, eyes wide open, eyebrows raised high, hands on cheeks, exaggerated gasp
